#summary Explanation of the calculation of width and height for Widget objects

= Introduction =

Widget objects have several size functions:

 * getHeight/Width (the actual height/width)
 * setHeight/Width (protected, a suggestion for height/width)
 * getMinHeight/Width
 * setMinHeight/Width (protected)

And for Layout objects only:
 * getStretchedHeight/Width
 * setStretchedHeight/Width (protected)
